prompt: give me the events and sort them descending ->
Show me events and sort them descending. With a limit of of 200 events ->
give me the events showing the fields: user name, ip address, and message ->
Create a query to get the events showing the fields: user name, ip address, and message ->
completion:
fields @timestamp, userIdentity.userName, sourceIPAddress, @message 
 | sort @timestamp desc 
 | limit 20

prompt: give me the events showing the fields: event name, user name, ip address, and message ->
completion:
fields @timestamp,eventName, userIdentity.userName, sourceIpAddress, @message  
 | sort @timestamp desc 
 | limit 20

prompt: give me the events executed by mike showing the fields: event name, user name, ip address, and message ->
completion:
fields @timestamp,eventName, userIdentity.userName, sourceIpAddress, @message 
 | filter userIdentity.userName = "mike"  
 | sort @timestamp desc 
 | limit 20
